file_content.text: She has left for Gorma-Koss. Our hope goes with her.
She can't have gone far.
I want to catch up with her.
I do not know her journey's path.
Why stick your neck out for a stranger?
Took a big risk attacking me.
There are no words between a Voss and Gormak, only violence.
The outsider woman carries an offer of peace.
What is Gorma-Koss?
Gorma-Koss?
The heart of Gormak lands. There they assemble, they are numerous.
Commandos stand vigil over Gorma-Koss. Their commander may witness the outsider's passing.
If word of this scuffle gets out, I'll be paying you another visit.
Forget we ever met.
The fault was ours.
Thanks for the information. No hard feelings.
That helps. Call us even.
A fool curses fate.
Go in peace.
And I'll witness yours.
We're done. [Kill the Mystics]
I been wantin' to see what color they are on the inside.
See the look on their faces when you offed that old fossil? Yeah, that was good.
Playtime's over, Skadge.
Let's go.
Yeah, yeah, I'm comin'.
I only did it to keep them from running their mouths.
This wasn't for fun.
Whatever, stick in the mud.
Nothing beats that look of hate from someone helpless to stop you.
Yeah it was.
Ain't it the truth.
Blizz glad boss not let blue-alien put Blizz in cage again.
Better slip out of here before people start asking questions.
Ambassador won't like this.
We need to keep on the general's trail.
Keep moving.
On it.
I'm sure I'll hear about this later.
Probably not.
Probably.
He's gonna have a fit one way or another.
Yoran doesn't like anything.
Probably.
I don't think that was such a good idea.
Redrish already has a leg up on us. Let's move.
We need to hurry.
Right behind you.
The general's got enough of an advantage without them warning her.
Sure it was.
I guess, but I don't think this is going to endear us with the Voss.
You want me to tell them I'm sorry?
Too late now.
Oh, just forget it.
That all you skinny runts got?
My gift is not foresight, but I see your fate is not for us to decide.
Where are you hiding General Redrish?
Give up the general.
That mean you won't try anything else?
No more trouble then?
I'm a force of nature, the only smart thing to do is stay out of my way.
Now you're learning.
We cannot stop what must come to pass.
The human woman has gone.
We aren't alone.
You get the feeling we're being watched?
Pilgrims are so few now. And outsiders.
I'm looking for another pilgrim. Your messenger said you'd know who I mean.
Where's the woman?
The visionary without visions. I spoke with her.
I heard you had a vision about me.
You wanted to see me?
I know of your coming.
People only grow by facing challenges.
A shame more don't risk it.
The wise don't seek adversity. It will come.
Might have something to do with the death trap at your door step.
Isn't exactly a leisure hike.
It is not the trials. Where we were once, Gormak are.
I'm here; what do you want?
Change has come to Voss; Voss must come to change.
The outsider woman you seek will be the agent of that change.
Do you know where I can find her, or not?
That's not my concern.
How much do you know about my business with General Redrish?
You know I'm looking for her?
She told me you would follow, and your intentions.
Is she planning something?
What kind of change?
She believes coexistence with the Gormak is possible, but someone must give voice to it. I believe that voice is hers. You will not silence it.
She better work fast; her future's looking cloudy.
I wouldn't get your hopes up.
She will have time.
Hello! Aww... what colorful people have against Blizz?
Well, seems like we've worn out our welcome. We'll just be going....
Brought some friends for us to play with. Thanks.
Hey, what gives? You guys aren't supposed to be taking sides.
Stay in peace and leave in time. No harm will come, unless you resist.
You break your neutrality, you'll regret it.
I wouldn't try to stop me.
We are prepared for force.
Sorry, I've got a job to do.
I can't let you stop me.
My regrets.
Restrain him.
Restrain her.
I ain't gonna be your prisoner.
Bad move. [Attack.]
